profileText: a Representative from Virginia; born in Pennsylvania, September 11, 1965; graduated from Liberty Christian Academy, Lynchburg, Va., 1983 ; B.S., Liberty University, Lynchburg, Va., 1988; M.B.A., Liberty University, Lynchburg, Va., 2010; financial executive; faculty, Liberty University, 200 5–2020; member, board of supervisors, Campbell County, Va., 2016–2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021–present).
